subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|目|t1=eye|民|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – close your eyes and go to sleep.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=mián
|c=min4
|h=pfs=mìn
|md=mìng/mièng
|md_note=mìng - vernacular; mièng - literary
|mn=bîn/biân
|mn_note = bîn - vernacular; biân - literary
|mn-t=ming5/mung5
|mn-t_note=ming5 - literary; mung5 - vernacular
|w=3mi
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v
}}
